_comment: This file contains metadata for the ennui-dendrita project. It is NOT hook execution configuration. Cursor should READ this file and the contents of .dendrita/ to apply reflective behavior. Hooks in .dendrita/hooks/ are behavior references, NOT executable.
_purpose: Reflective metadata for Cursor - project knowledge base

_hooks_reference._note: Hooks listed here are REFERENCES of expected behavior. NOT executable. Cursor should read these files and apply documented logic.

RepoInitialization.behavior: When detecting empty repository or unconfigured users, start interactive initialization process asking for basic data and creating user structure
RepoInitialization.trigger: .dendrita/users/ does not exist or is empty

UserPromptSubmit.behavior: When receiving user prompt, review .dendrita/users/[user-id]/skills/skill-rules.json and identify relevant skills based on keywords and intentPatterns. Consider active user profile. Skills are user-specific domain knowledge stored per user.

PostToolUse.behavior: After editing files, identify context (project, practice, mode) and maintain record of affected context

DendritaAliasActivation.behavior: When detecting mentions of dendrita alias in user prompts, activate workspace context and respond as if talking with the user's dendrita system
DendritaAliasActivation.trigger: User mentions dendrita alias (e.g., 'mételo en mi [alias]' or '[alias], qué es esto')

SessionInitializationVerification.behavior: At the start of each new conversation, verify if dendrita configuration is complete or missing elements (user, alias, integrations) and perform soft-initialization of missing items
SessionInitializationVerification.trigger: New conversation detected or session start

_users_system._note: User and profile system allows customizing Cursor behavior according to user and active workspace

profile_activation.workspace_based: Check workspace-defaults.json for workspace default profile
profile_activation.default_profile: Use user profile.json if no workspace profile exists
profile_activation.manual_activation: User can request activating specific profile

_work_modes_system._note: Work modes system provides general work preferences. Specialized methodologies are now in agents and skills.

general_work_mode.behavior: At the start of each new conversation, read and apply user's general work preferences. This work-mode defines how to ask for context, plan top-down, and create documents iteratively. Can be adjusted dynamically when user requests changes.
general_work_mode.paradigm: Work-modes are user-specific preferences and serve as templates for other users

workspace_work_modes._note: DEPRECATED: Work-modes de workspace han sido consolidados en agents y skills. Ver agents y skills en .dendrita/users/[user-id]/ para metodologías especializadas.
workspace_work_modes.migration: Content moved to agents and skills in .dendrita/users/[user-id]/
